issue.title: [Plasma] Add Delete method for multiple objects
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2794](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2794). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This improves efficiency since multiple objects can be deleted with a single RPC.

comments.body:
